titles.title: To prohibit United States foreign assistance from being provided to any country that refuses to extradite to the United States individuals accused of killing law enforcement officers.
To prohibit United States foreign assistance from being provided to any country that refuses to extradite to the United States individuals accused of killing law enforcement officers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Prohibits the provision of U.S. foreign assistance to any country the government of which refuses to extradite to the United States, upon the request of the U.S. government, any individual accused in the United States of killing a law enforcement officer.
